title: Reth 1.0: How did we get here and what is next?
description:
Reth is an Ethereum Execution Layer in development since 2022, focused on contributor-friendliness, modularity and performance. 

In 2024, after rigorous testing and security review, Reth had its first 1.0 prod-ready release. 

In this talk, we review the process of shipping a state of the art & novel Ethereum node, and lay out Reth's plans for the next years.
